programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: La guardería está cerrada y Silvia y Luis no tienen quién cuide a Luisito Jr., por lo que tendrán que elegir entre los vecinos. Hipólito, Pedro y Germán buscan hacer válida la garantía de un celular.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Comedy

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Germán convoca a una junta vecinal, pero nadie asiste porque nadie vio el anuncio en el pizarrón, Jorjais les propone hacer un grupo de chat para enterarse de los acontecimientos en el edificio.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Como es costumbre en el edificio, los vecinos no pagan la cuota del gas, y ante la negativa de todos, Luis decide poner su propio tanque estacionario ¡en la azotea!

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Luis estaciona su carro afuera de su edificio y un franelero quiere cobrarle 20 pesos por cuidar su coche. Los vecinos hacen una junta para planear quitarlos sin que haya consecuencias.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Los vecinos reciben una invitación de la delegación para separar la basura. Algo muy básico: orgánica e inorgánica, Germán es el encargado de dicha misión.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Magdalena abre una cuenta en Facebook donde presume demasiadas cosas e inclusive transmite en vivo una invitación pública para la fiesta de su nieto Morris.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Pedro se dedica a buscar mujeres por Facebook, y ante el asombro de Luis, conoce a una chica guapísima; Luis tiene curiosidad y decide aplicar la misma técnica para encontrar al amor de su vida.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Silvia, desesperada por conocer hombres, renta una habitación de su departamento por medio de una aplicación; un hombre apuesto renta el cuarto, ella se enamora, pero aparece la ex novia y comienzan los problemas.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Un temblor llega a la ciudad sacudiendo todos los departamentos de los vecinos. Luis les propone a los vecinos llevar a una persona de Protección civil para prepararlos ante una emergencia.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Morris está en la etapa de las dudas y pregunta a sus padres cómo conquistar al amor de su vida. Alejandra y Rocko deciden contarle una historia de amor: el relato de cómo se conocieron.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Silvia instala internet de alta velocidad en su departamento, sin embargo su conexión es muy lenta; lo que no sabe es que sus vecinos saben la contraseña y todos se conectan a su red.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Comedy

programme.title: Vecinos

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Lorena trata de seducir a Frankie, pero él la rechaza porque está escribiendo un guión, ella lo insulta y él decide irse de su casa. Finalmente Benito regresa a casa después de 10 años.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Benito está de regreso después de mucho tiempo. Lalo invita a salir a Silvita y comienza a planear su futuro. A los López Pérez les cortan los servicios y dejan sin luz a media colonia.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Silvia y Arturo compiten para ser el presidente del vecindario. Alejandra y Rocko se preocupan porque creen que han perdido su juventud y personalidad.

programme.title: Sortilegio
programme.desc: Alejandro returns home after a terrible accident to discover that he is married to Maria Jose, a poor, innocent girl who was deceived by Alejandro's brother Bruno. Bruno used Alejandro's name to marry Maria Jose, soon after he sent to kill his brother in hopes that Maria Jose would inherit Alejandro's fortune. But when Maria Jose arrives at the mansion she realizes that Bruno lied to her and used her. She is also scared when Alejandro is found alive and returns home. Doctors tell Alejandro that he suffers from memory loss but he is convinced he never met Maria Jose before and goes in search of the truth, but during this time and Maria Jose actually fall in love, while Bruno and Maura (Alejandro's ex-girlfriend) plot to break them up. Meanwhile, the brothers' mother Victoria has fallen in love with Fernando--Alejandro's best friend, so closer to his age than hers.

programme.title: Arizona Crime Uncovered: Where is Cookie Jacobson?
programme.desc: Just days after Cookie Jacobson's 49th birthday, Bill Jacobson said he kissed his wife goodbye around 7:00 a.m. and left for work. That was the last time Bill ever saw his wife, and more than two decades later, it's not known what happened to Cookie. Ashley Holden sat down with Cookie's family as they push for answers all these years later.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve and his friend Ronny Boehme head to the vast sagebrush seas of Southeast Wyoming to hunt America's largest game bird, the sage grouse. Known for their size and elusive nature, these birds offer a challenging hunt across open country. Joined by local experts, they explore the complexities of sage grouse conservation and hunting, testing their patience and skills in pursuit of these storied birds.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Late October in Southeast Alaska finds Steve, Ryan Callahan, and Mark Borman chasing Sitka blacktail deer. As the bucks begin their descent from the alpine into dense timber, the trio faces the challenge of hunting in the thick, damp rainforest. While navigating through muskeg patches and testing their luck with calling techniques, they must contend with unpredictable weather and tough terrain. When deer prove elusive, they turn to fishing and foraging.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Midway through a challenging hunt on Prince of Wales Island, Steve, Ryan Callahan, and Mark Borman are searching for Sitka blacktail deer. The rut hasn‚Äôt kicked in as expected, leaving the hunters frustrated and the deer elusive. Adapting their strategies, they decide to split up and quietly stalk through dense woods and muskeg. After days of patience and perseverance, a mix of skill, luck, and determination finally leads them closer to success.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: In the bitter cold of Montana's Bitterroot Mountains, Steve teams up with Remi Warren for the closing days of the general elk season. Facing steep hills and frigid winds, they navigate public lands where competition is fierce, and success is hard-won. As they track elk across challenging terrain, Remi and Steve split up to increase their chances. A tense and calculated hunt unfolds, leading to a final showdown with two elusive bulls.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of Guyana's jungle, Steve teams up with Macushi guides Roven and Dennis to explore the wild Riwa River. They fish for piranhas and massive catfish, employing traditional methods passed down through generations. As they camp along the river, the crew learns the intricate skills of the Macushi, from crafting bows and arrows using natural materials to preparing their catch over a slow-burning fire. The journey is a raw adventure into survival, skill, and pragmatism.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of Guyana's jungle, Steve teams up with Macushi guides Roven and Dennis to explore the wild Riwa River. They fish for piranhas and massive catfish, employing traditional methods passed down through generations. As they camp along the river, the crew learns the intricate skills of the Macushi, from crafting bows and arrows using natural materials to preparing their catch over a slow-burning fire. programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of Guyana's jungle, Steve teams up with Macushi guides Roven and Dennis to explore the wild Riwa River. They fish for piranhas and massive catfish, employing traditional methods passed down through generations. As they camp along the river, the crew learns the intricate skills of the Macushi, from crafting bows and arrows using natural materials to preparing their catch over a slow-burning fire. The journey is a raw adventure into survival, skill, and pragmatism.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: In the rugged terrain of central Colorado, Steven Rinella and his friend Brody Henderson set out to hunt mule deer amidst aspen groves and sagebrush. Navigating unseasonably warm November weather, they face challenges in tracking down the elusive deer as the heat pushes the animals into cooler, shaded areas. After several attempts, including a close encounter thwarted by coyotes, the duo finally spots a promising buck.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Amidst the dense fog and relentless rain of Afognak Island, Steve and Remi embark on a challenging elk hunt, navigating rugged terrain and the constant presence of brown bears. As visibility dwindles and the weather worsens, they push forward in one of the most unpredictable environments. It‚Äôs a hunt that demands resilience, patience, and a deep respect for the wilderness.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve heads to the interior of Alaska with his friends Doug Duren and Mark Kenyon for an adventure amidst the caribou migration. Navigating rough terrain and unpredictable weather, they set up camp and begin the search for large, mature bulls. With thousands of caribou on the move and only a few days to hunt, the team experiences the excitement and unpredictability of caribou hunting in the heart of Alaska‚Äôs wilderness.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Continuing their adventure in Alaska‚Äôs interior, Steve, Doug, and Mark push deeper into the caribou migration. With Doug still hoping to take his first bull, the team sets up on a high ridge, watching caribou stream across the landscape. They face grizzly bears, dense fog, and the ever-changing weather of the Alaskan wilderness. As the days pass, they work together to intercept a herd of caribou, knowing their window could close.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: In this episode, Steven Rinella steps out of the field and into the kitchen to showcase some of his favorite wild game recipes. From wild turkey sausage and smoked trout to venison ribs and duck breast, he shares simple yet sophisticated ways to prepare these dishes. This cooking masterclass is a celebration of wild game, offering both seasoned hunters and novice cooks new ways to enjoy the fruits of their hunts.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steve heads to the panhandle of Idaho to join wildlife biologist and dedicated houndsman Bart George for a mountain lion hunt. Bruce Dunkin, Bart's mentor and hunting buddy, joins the crew as they attempt to cut a cat's track and let the dogs loose for a hunt in the deep timber of the Idaho mountains.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steven Rinella and Evan Hafer head into Southeast Alaska's coastal rainforest to hunt Sitka black-tailed deer. Using deer calls and antler rattling to mimic buck fights, they navigate through thick muskegs and challenging terrain. Despite tough weather conditions and elusive game, the two friends adapt to the conditions and stick it out, making the most of their hunt.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steven Rinella and Clay Newcomb head to Nebraska's Sandhills for a whitetail deer hunt, guided by Jordan Budd, an outfitter with a deep knowledge of the local terrain. As they navigate the wide-open spaces and cornfields, Jordan uses her expertise to narrow down the movement patters of the cagey bucks. The thick corn fields provide cover and food for the deer, making a tough hunt for the team.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steven Rinella joins Jean-Paul Bourgeois and Ronnie Collins in Louisiana‚ Mississippi Delta for a duck hunt. Surrounded by the unique landscape of the Delta, they target multiple duck species. After a successful hunt, the team returns to camp, where Jean-Paul prepares a traditional Cajun meal featuring the day‚ catch. Experience the cultural tradition of turning fresh game into flavorful, local dishes like duck gumbo and crawfish boil.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steven Rinella heads to New Mexico's Gila Wilderness with his friend Carl Malcolm to hunt Merriam's turkeys. Set against a backdrop of stunning landscapes and rich history, they explore the first federally protected wilderness in the world. Although few and far between, the duo find gobbling birds through hard scouting and perserverence.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.desc: Steven Rinella heads to the Gulf of Mexico for a spearfishing adventure beneath the oil rigs that serve as artificial reefs. Joined by his spearfishing mentor Greg Fonts and Brandon Hendrickson, they target a variety of prized fish, including Cobia and red snapper. The episode captures the thrill of diving in murky waters filled with sharks and navigating the massive structures. Along the way, they showcase the rich marine life of the Gulf and the skills needed to harvest fresh seafood.
